thread.title: Ellie Goulding, Shay Mitchell Join 2015 MTV EMA Performers and Presenters
thread.title_full: Ellie Goulding, Shay Mitchell Join 2015 MTV EMA Performers and Presenters

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Ellie Goulding, Shay Mitchell Join 2015 MTV EMA Performers and Presenters
text:
Comments Goulding will take the stage as performer along with Jason Derulo, Twenty One Pilots, Ed Sheeran and previously announced Pharrell Williams. 
Ellie Goulding , Jason Derulo and Twenty One Pilots can all be found at the same venue later this month. The 2015 MTV European Music Awards organizers have just announced a slew of performers and presenters set to take the stage in Milan on October 25. The three aforementioned acts join the previously-announced performer Pharrell Williams . The night's host Ed Sheeran will also serve as performer, sharing the stage with electronic group Rudimental. Meanwhile, DJ/producer Martin Garrix and " Pretty Little Liars " star Shay Mitchell are scheduled to present at the show. The 2015 MTV EMAs will be broadcast live from the Mediolanum Forum at 8 P.M. ET/PT in the U.S. on MTV. Sheeran will host with " Orange Is the New Black " actress Ruby Rose . Voting for the nominees is already open and will close on October 24 at 11.59 P.M. CET.
